# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia	function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int = 10)
	words = split(text, " ")
	current_line = ""
	lines = String[]
	for word in words
		if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
			push!(lines, current_line)
			current_line = String(word)
		else
			current_line *= " " * (text_width - length(current_line) - length(word) + 1) * word
		end
	end
	push!(lines, current_line)
	join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example
wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines", 15)
```

Output:
```
"This function will wrap words into lines"
"This function will wrap"
"words into lines"
```
